title: Connection times out after match
body: {{champion:245}} Recently, after almost every game I play, my client gets stuck on the page that says, "Waiting for Stats..." then the box that says, "Skip Waiting for Stats" before my connection "times out". This has been getting very annoying because I have gotten multiple S's (according to my friends) but I have never been able to see it. I have tried restarting my client, and even reinstalling my game. Thanks in advance for any help. :)

replies.body: Timeouts can be due to a weak network that's having trouble maintaining a connection with our servers.  I agree with Rineyy here that our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide could help get this resolved for you.  Let me know if you have any issues!
